headline.main: REICH-MADE PLANES SEEN OVER BATAAN; Japanese Believed Dipping Into Reserves to Keep Up Bombing of Philippine Defenders LANAO MOROS LOYAL TO US Leaders of 10,000 Pledge They Will Never Give Up Fighting Till Invaders Are Defeated

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 2 -- Indications that German-made bombers were being used by the Japanese in their air forays against the defenders of Bataan Peninsula in the Philippines were reported today to the War Department by General Douglas MacArthur. In local bombing raids behind the defenders lines, he-said, were some two-engine airplanes painted black, with white crosses on their wings.
abstract: Lanao Moros pledge resistance to U S foes
